question: What is the theme of the 2017 World Soil Day (WSD)?
option3: Healthy soils for a healthy life
option4: Caring for the Planet starts from the Ground
answer: Caring for the Planet starts from the Ground
explanation: The World Soil Day (WSD) is observed every year on December 5 to communicate messages on the importance of soil quality for food security, healthy ecosystems and human well-being. The 2017 theme is “Caring for the Planet starts from the Ground”. It is celebrated annually at the Food and Agriculture Organization (FAO) headquarters in Rome, the regional offices and through national and local events.
